name: peer_node_fs_callback
description: Create a Node application application (no Express here) that will read in a text file called `numbers.txt` containing numbers seperated by a comma. Your application should output the highest number found, the lowest number found, and the average of all the numbers rounded to the closest whole number. Your application should call a function titled `done` when finish and log a message stating so. All logging should be done within the `done` function.
author: Ryan Mattson and Anthony Maki
